metadata.title: JYX Pearl Necklace 6-7mm Pink Baroque Pearl and Rose Quartz Pendant Necklace 16.5"
features: This fashionable necklace is mainly strung with pink freshwater pearls. There is also a light pink pendant made of ross quartz in the necklace served as a decoration

description: *This fashionable necklace is mainly strung with pink freshwater pearls. There is also a light pink pendant made of ross quartz in the necklace served as a decoration. *At the end of the necklace, a white gilded clasp is used as a connection. The necklace has a length of 16.5 inches.
